subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After a seven-game showdown in last season’s N.B.A. finals, the Heat and the Spurs left their cores intact, but they have continued adapting on the way to a rematch.
snippet: After a seven-game showdown in last season’s N.B.A. finals, the Heat and the Spurs left their cores intact, but they have continued adapting on the way to a rematch.
